plot: Bud arrives for the reading of his late uncle's will. But his other uncle has already seen the will and he will receive the estate only if Bud is married. Finding Bud unmarried, he has a plan that will force Bud into a quick marriage.
title: Romance Revier
plot_es: Bud arrives for the reading of his late uncle's will. But his other uncle has already seen the will and he will receive the estate only if Bud is married. Finding Bud unmarried, he has a plan that will force Bud into a quick marriage.
plot_en: Bud arrives for the reading of his late uncle's will. But his other uncle has already seen the will and he will receive the estate only if Bud is married. Finding Bud unmarried, he has a plan that will force Bud into a quick marriage.
